mosinstall.name: JUGA-enabled Admin
mosinstall.author: Dioscouri Design
mosinstall.description:
"JUGA-Enabled" Admin Template by Dioscouri based on the "Minted One-Point-Five" from Joomlaworks

Use of this template on the Admin side of your website enables JUGA access controls -- You may quickly allow and disallow Administrators access to specific sections of your Admin side. NOTE: You *MUST* have at least JUGA v0.9 installed and *THIS* template defaulted for the JUGA controls to be activated on your Admin side. JUGA will *NOT* restrict access to content unless this template is in use.

This template is inspired by Joomla 1.5's administrator template 'Khepri' -created by Andy Miller and released under the GNU/GPL license- and the very famous statistics package 'Mint' designed and created by Shaun Inman.

For more info on this template, please visit Dioscouri Design.

(Version 1.0 - Created on 01 February 2008)
